publicationStmt.p: 【四庫全書・文淵閣】 hastily tranformed to TEI for testing. Access via kanripo.org: includes scanned page images.

sourceDesc.p: Converted to TEI from Kanripo source files at .

encodingDesc.p: Digital Scans of the source images are hosted on kanripo.org . Original page numbering not visible on scans, hence logical numbering generated automatically. Gaiji characters have been either inserted into text where unicode codepoints permitted, or transcribed using unicode ICD format.

langUsage.language: pinyin transliteration of Chinese characters without tonal diacrits
pinyin transliteration of Chinese characters according to national standard of PRC, gb/t 16159-2012
